com.cmput301.recipebot.model.local

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.cmput301.recipebot.model.local.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    A wrapper around SQLiteOpenHelper and SQLiteDatabase so we can just query for our objects. It maintians a static instance of itself that should be used by other objects that need this.
    See Also:
    instance, getInstance(android.content.Context)

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DatabaseHelper getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Returns a static instance of the DatabaseHelper. If the instance does not exist, a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to open the database. Regardless of the Context provided, it uses the Application context.
        Returns:
        an instance of the DatabaseHelper.
